description.raw:
There is a problem with qemu on arm64. It is [hanging apt jobs](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/opensplice-debbuilder/79/console) with the following message:

`qemu: Unsupported syscall: 277`

The 277 syscall in arm64 qemu is related to seccomp and the problem is that it has not being implemented. The error hangs apt when processing man-db operations \(call seccomp\). That can be avoided by setting the variable `MAN_DISABLE_SECCOMP`to 1.

Tested here: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/opensplice-debbuilder/80/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/opensplice-debbuilder/80/)

FYI: @nuclearsandwich
